name: LegalShield
0:
”Alexa, Open LegalShield”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: legalshield
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get answers to common legal questions, as well as questions about LegalShield and much more! With LegalShield Virtual Assistant, help is just one voice command away!

To begin, enable the LegalShield skill.

Simply say “Alexa, open LegalShield.”
